entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early this evening. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A few showers. High 12.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon with a few showers. Risk of a thunderstorm late in the afternoon. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 12. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: A few rain showers changing to flurries near midnight and ending overnight then cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm early in the evening. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 15 April 2023
